s3compat_bucket_linked: ${user} linked the S3 Compatible Storage bucket ${bucket} to ${node}
s3compat_bucket_unlinked: ${user} unselected the S3 Compatible Storage bucket ${bucket} in ${node}
s3compat_file_added: ${user} added file ${path} to S3 Compatible Storage bucket ${bucket} in ${node}
s3compat_file_removed: ${user} removed ${path} in S3 Compatible Storage bucket ${bucket} in ${node}
s3compat_file_updated: ${user} updated file ${path} in S3 Compatible Storage bucket ${bucket} in ${node}
s3compat_folder_created: ${user} created folder ${path} in S3 Compatible Storage bucket ${bucket} in ${node}
s3compat_node_authorized: ${user} authorized the S3 Compatible Storage addon for ${node}
s3compat_node_deauthorized: ${user} deauthorized the S3 Compatible Storage addon for ${node}
s3compat_node_deauthorized_no_user: S3 Compatible Storage addon for ${node} deauthorized
